titles.title: Save Lives Act

To amend the Federal Election Campaign Act of 1971 to prohibit a separate segregated fund of a corporation which is engaged in the manufacture of opioids from making contributions or expenditures in connection with elections for Federal office, and for other purposes.
Save Lives Act

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on House Administration.

bill.summary:
Save Lives Act
This bill prohibits political contributions and expenditures from a separate segregated political fund of a company engaged in the manufacture of opioids.
